name: Laser for Home Animal Joke
description:
Laser for Home Animal Joke
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Laser.
Laser House Pets joke - the game is a simulator of the laser for your pet!
You have a fat cat? Or maybe lazy and does not want to do not what to play?
Try our simulator Laser Cat!
The game is a joke laser shows!
Raffle friends and loved ones, pretend that you have a real laser!
There are many different beautiful lasers and laser pointers!
Warning: this is not a real laser, but only laser simulator!
Leave us a comment and evaluation, we consider them in our next update! Thank you for playing our games!
